Performance of logging

Experimental results are listed below in units of micro-seconds . Measurements were done on a AMD Athlon 2200+ running Linux Mandrake 10.0.

Version 0.9.6
Layout NullAppender FileAppender FileAppender (no flush) AsyncAppender (no flush)
SimpleLayout 4 12 11 24
PatternLayout "%p - %m%n" 5 12 5 15
PatternLayout "%-5p - %m%n" 6 NA NA NA
TTCCLayout/RELATIVE 7 17 17 29
PatternLayout "%r [%t] %-5p %c{2} %x - %m%n" 10 NA NA NA
PatternLayout "%r [%t] %-5p %.10c %x - %m%n" 11 NA NA NA
PatternLayout "%r [%t] %-5p %.20c %x - %m%n" 11 NA NA NA
PatternLayout "%r [%t] %-5p %c - %m%n" 9 18 10 22
TTCCLayout/ISO8601 12 23 23 36
PatternLayout "%d{ISO8601} [%t] %-5p %c %x - %m%n" 14 26 16 29
PatternLayout "%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss,SSS} [%t] %-5p %c %x - %m%n" 14 26 16 28
PatternLayout "%l - %m%n" 6 14 6 13
PatternLayout "%F.%L - %m%n" 6 NA NA NA
